Player History
Earned first career win on 4/12/2013...
Injured on 6/20/2014 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 4/15/2016 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/3/2016 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Philadelphia on 6/9/2017 (Going to CHW: 1B Jose Pujols, P Braden Shipley, P Ben Holmes, 3B Maikel Franco. Going to PHI: P Chris Sale, SS Asdrubal Cabrera)...
Had first career hit on 7/3/2017, off C.J. Edwards (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/19/2017, off Jameson Taillon (PIT)...
9/21/2017: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $20,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Injured on 9/18/2018 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/7/2019 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 7/23/2019 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young in 2020, going 18-6, 2.68 ERA...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/26/2021 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/17/2021 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Philadelphia to Tampa Bay on 7/31/2022 (Going to TB: P Chris Sale. Going to PHI: P Steven Derrick, C Daryl Young)...
9/21/2022: Signed a contract extension with Tampa Bay, $21,300,000 per year, for 4 years.
